newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria sells 51.724 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria sells 51.724 bln levs 1- and 4-wk T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry on Wednesday sold two discount T-bill issues with maturities of one week and four weeks, yielding 3.81 percent and 17.62 percent to maturity, respectively, the central bank said.
Bids were received for a total of 51.974 billion levs of T-bills but the ministry approved bids for 51.724 billion levs worth of paper.
The issues were offered with no par value or minimum acceptable price set in advance by the ministry. Auction date and maturity date for each issue overlap.
Details of the issues follow. Prices in percent of par:
Avg yield to maturity 3.81 pct 17.62 pct
